__e: I believe it's the most prudent thing to just...
Well, we better get you out of here, before you die of cold.
Seeing as she's quite possibly the last remaining witness to this event, I think it's prudent to keep it to myself.
I know to be careful and I know what has to be done.
But I want you to know, if you want it... I know you'll be careful... and I'll be fine.
Whenever I wanted something, I could hear that voice telling me to stop, to be careful, to leave most of my life unlived.
If I were a conservative type I would not be here, sir.
It all happened so fast, and I figured knew.
It wasn't safe, it wasn't fair, and I had to say something.
